DIALOGUE
> Appointed: ""I'm here, I'm here! Whaddya need, Doc?""
> Default 1: ""The cool morning air is perfect for running in! C'mon, you gotta feel it on your skin. That's what it means to be free.""
> Default 2: ""My sword is too impractical? Ah, yeah, it's true that it really can't cut mountains. Still, gotta take pride in what you have left, right?""

> Default 3: ""When I was a kid, I thought those pictures of chariots in Minos and Siracusa were like, the coolest thing. S'why I chose this code name, 'Chariot'- They're basically unstoppable, right? And I'm uh, y'know, pretty unstoppable, too!""

> Promotion 1: ""You know, a few Operators here wear masks. It's just another piece of clothing for them- a part of them that can't be separated from them. Whether it's a friend or a way to cover up a wound... A lot of people wear masks, if it's like that, huh? Well, not me, of course!""

> Promotion 2: ""What does it mean, being a hero? What more must I do, until I might adopt such a title? ...Ah, Doctor. Sorry. It's just that- I was lost in my own thoughts. There's a question I have to answer one day. It's for someone very important to me.""

> 40% Trust: ""Rhodes Island isn't just about helping with the Oripathy in people's bodies, huh? They're even helping with the Oripathy in people's hearts and minds, too. Even if we can't get rid of Oripathy for good, the Infected should be given the right to live, not just be allowed to survive.""
> 100% Trust: ""At night, it's not so cold like Kazimierz. The wind isn't as strong, and even if I don't know everyone here, they won't treat me like I don't exist... Like I'm not a person at all.""
> 200% Trust: ""Broken things can be so beautiful... What was once 'perfect' and 'whole', now becomes irreparably flawed. Even if pieced back together, it will still show those cracks...""
> Idle: ""...Just what goes on in that head of yours?""
> Onboard: ""Oh, you're the Doctor? Uh, pleasure to meet you. Operator Chariot, reporting in. You give me a task, I'll do it. As long as I can stay!""
> Watching Battle Record: ""Ah, so it's like that, huh. I understand everything now...""
> Promotion 1: ""Whoa, Doc. I'M promoted? Uh, ahah, that really ain't necessary... And I don't get a say in this?!""
> Promotion 2: ""We have to keep moving towards the tomorrow that we seek. Doctor, you believe in me, so I will believe in you. I will run with you, towards that future you seek.""
> Added to Squad: ""C'mon, c'mon! Let's get goin', already.""
> Added as Squad Leader: ""Huh? Me? Leader? ...Alright, then! Let's uh, let's mosey.""
> Assigned to Facility: ""Yep, I'm here. Won't slack off this time... yet.""
> Tap: ""Wh-! Please... um, please don't touch me so suddenly...""
> Trust Tap: ""Oh, hey Doc... Um, how long have you been there?""
> Depart: ""Alrighty! Let's see this quest through.""
> Selected 2: ""No standing pat. Let's go already!""
> 4-star Result: ""Nice. Scratch down another big win for us in the books.""
> 3-star Result: ""Hey, great job, Doc. I'm pretty good, huh?""
> 2-star Result: ""If they come back, we'll get 'em then... I hope they don't come back.""
> Failure: ""Everyone, run! Get going! I'll... I'll pull my weight, right here, right now. I'll hold them off while you run, so go...!"""

* Day 5 - Creative Day - Using Binary to control more lights
* have an ""All Lights On"" mode to catch any intruders
Binary uses only 0's and 1's. Switches have either on or off so we can use them
If a switch is off the number would be 0 and if it's on the number would be 1
As we have 3 switches, Switch 1 = 1, Switch 2 = 2, and Switch 3 = 4
If Switch 1 and Switch 3 are in the on position the count would be 1 + 4 which = 5
If there were more switches, binary counting would see it as (if turned on):
If all were turned on it would be 1+2+4+8+16+32+64+128 which would = 255

* Day 5 - Creative Day - Using Binary to control more lights
* have an ""All Lights On"" mode to catch any intruders
Binary uses only 0's and 1's. Switches have either on or off so we can use them
If a switch is off the number would be 0 and if it's on the number would be 1
As we have 3 switches, Switch 1 = 1, Switch 2 = 2, and Switch 3 = 4
If Switch 1 and Switch 3 are in the on position the count would be 1 + 4 which = 5
If there were more switches, binary counting would see it as (if turned on):
If all were turned on it would be 1+2+4+8+16+32+64+128 which would = 255
